tasks.task: Growing medicinal plants in the backyard.
subtasks: Identify medicinal plants suitable for the area (climate, soil, etc.)
Research and confirm the correct plant species (e.g., different basil varieties)
Choose the right time to harvest different plant parts (leaves, flowers, roots)
Prepare the garden bed with proper soil and conditions
Plant the medicinal herbs in the garden bed
Water and maintain the plants (regular care)
Harvest the plants at the optimal time
Dry herbs for oil, tincture, or vinegar preparations
Use fresh herbs for immediate teas, soups, or poultices
Store dried herbs in a dry, airy place and label them
Make medicinal oils by infusing herbs in oil
Create tinctures by steeping herbs in alcohol
Use finished herbal products for self-medications and family needs
Practice holistic medicine using herbal preparations for various conditions
